text: @GOPChairwoman Sure. China was responsible for our government's response to coronavirus. China actually wants another 4 years of Trump. Trump has a half billion dollars in loans from CCP backed banks coming due. Ivanka got special treatment and got 7 Chinese patents. Really unprecedented stuff.
